name: Clay Combat
description:
Play solo or coop with and run through this simple hack and slash world.

To play split screen you need an xBox controller. Once you open the game, press Start on the xBox controller.

Player 1 Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Tumble

Mouse - Turn

Hold Left Click  and Move Mouse in direction to attack

Player 2 Controls:

Left Stick - Move

A - Tumble

Right Stick - Turn

Hold Right Trigger and Move Right Stick to attack
